de.mrapp.android.preference.util

Class Condition

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.preference.util.Condition

  • public final class Condition
extends Object
    An utility class, which offers static methods to ensure, that attributes satisfy specific conditions by throwing exceptions, if the conditions are not satisfied.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Method Detail

      • ensureNotNull

        public static void ensureNotNull(Object reference,
                 String exceptionMessage)
        Ensures, that a reference is not null. Otherwise a NullPointerException with a specific message will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        reference - The reference, which should be checked, as an instance of the class Object
        exceptionMessage - The message of the NullPointerException, which is thrown, if the given reference is null, as a String

      • ensureAtLeast

        public static void ensureAtLeast(float value,
                 float referenceValue,
                 String exceptionMessage)
        Ensures, that a Float value is at least a specific value. Otherwise an IllegalArgumentException with a specific message will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        value - The value, which should be checked, as a Float value
        referenceValue - The value, the given value must be at least, as a Float value
        exceptionMessage - The message of the IllegalArgumentException, which is thrown, if the given value is less than the reference value, as a String

      • ensureAtMaximum

        public static void ensureAtMaximum(float value,
                   float referenceValue,
                   String exceptionMessage)
        Ensures, that a Float value is at maximum a specific value. Otherwise an IllegalArgumentException with a specific message will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        value - The value, which should be checked, as a Float value
        referenceValue - The value, the given value must be at maximum, as a Float value
        exceptionMessage - The message of the IllegalArgumentException, which is thrown, if the given value is greater than the reference value, as a String

      • ensureLessThan

        public static void ensureLessThan(float value,
                  float referenceValue,
                  String exceptionMessage)
        Ensures, that a Float value is less than a reference value. Otherwise an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        value - The value, which should be checked, as a Float value
        referenceValue - The value, the given value must be less than, as a Float value
        exceptionMessage - The message of the IllegalArgumentException, which is thrown, if the given value is greater or equal than the reference value, as a String

      • ensureGreaterThan

        public static void ensureGreaterThan(float value,
                     float referenceValue,
                     String exceptionMessage)
        Ensures, that a Float value is greater than a reference value. Otherwise an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        value - The value, which should be checked, as a Float value
        referenceValue - The value, the given value must be greater than, as a Float value
        exceptionMessage - The message of the IllegalArgumentException, which is thrown, if the given value is less or equal than the reference value, as a String
